skill-desc.skill_description: レース中間からロングスパートをかけて速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: From the middle of the race slightly increase your speed by running a long spurt

skill-desc.skill_description: 残り200mを切って前の方にいると競り合いに強くなり速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed and power lightly when close to the lead in last 200m

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半で1番をキープし続ける力をわずかに発揮する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Be in the lead during the 2nd half of the race to gain slightly more power to help you stay in 1st place

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと末脚を使って速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Lightly increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight.

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で余力を持って前にいるとわずかに優位を保ちやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly easier to keep advantage if you have enough strength in the Final Leg straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで後ろから追い抜くと女帝たる走りで速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Lightly increase speed when passing in the back in last corner

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で競り合うと直線でわずかに抜け出しやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly easier to break away when competing in the last corner

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置につこうとして加速力が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Gain a slight increase in acceleration as you attempt to gain positions during the last corner of the race

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半のコーナーで控えていると持久力が少し回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Lightly recover stamina in the second half of the race's corner by holding yourself back

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で競り合いに負けない気持ちが湧き、速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On the final straight your desire not to lose, increases your speed lightly

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半に前の方で競り合うとバクシン力（？）を発揮、速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: While fighting for the lead during the second part of the race, lightly increase your speed through displaying your Bakushin power

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤で好位置にいる時に持久力が少し回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Be in a good position during the middle stage of the race to lightly recover your endurance

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くのウマ娘を見て持久力を少し回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Being at the back during the last corner, lightly restores your endurance when you see another horse girl

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤に前方が詰まるとお告げの力で少し道を切り開く
skill-desc.skill_translated: If during the last leg of the race your way to the front of the field is blocked, your power of divination will make it lightly easier to spot an opening

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうになると闘志に火が付き速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, you gain a little bit more fighting spirit and lightly increase your speed

skill-desc.skill_description: レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り200mで実力発揮、速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: If you can get calm and composed through the race, you will be able to showcase your ability and increase your speed for the last 200m

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤に前の方で相手を抜くと勢いに乗って速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Overtake the opponent in front of you during the last leg of the race to gain momentum and increase your speed

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で差を付けて先頭にいるとさらなる脚を使って、速度を上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Be in the lead with a gap behind you at the last straight to increase your speed even more through your legs

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で前と差が詰まると華麗な脚取りで速度がすごく上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Close down the leader on the final straight to greatly increase your speed even further through your brilliant leg work

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナー以降で前の方にいるとギアを変えて加速力が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase acceleration from final corner onward by changing gears when leading

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で前の方で少し抜け出ていると輝きを増し速度がすごく上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: If you're in front at the final straight and manage to break out a little, increase speed greatly

skill-desc.skill_description: 残り200m地点で前の方にいると道を開いてすごく抜け出しやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Be close to the lead during the last 200m to make it easier to break through and find a way through the field

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中間からロングスパートをかけて速度が少しずつ上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Gradually increase speed during the long spurt in Middle Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: 残り200mを切って前の方にいると競り合いに強くなり速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed and power when close to the lead in last 200m

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半で1番をキープし続ける力を発揮する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Display your power in keeping the lead position during the latter half of the race

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで好位置にいると弾みを付けて加速力が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Be in a good position at the last corner to gain momentum and increase your acceleration

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと末脚を使って速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で後ろの方から外を回って追い抜く時、速度を上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On last straight, gain speed when passing from the outside back

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方にいると抜かさせない覚悟を決めて速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Be close to the lead in the final corner to gain speed as you resolve yourself to not be overtaken

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で余力を持って前にいるとより優位を保ちやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Easier to keep a good position in last straight with spare energy

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で競り合うと王たる輝きで速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Fight for the lead at the last corner to increase your speed through your kingly radiance

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナー以降で外から追い抜くと怪物的な力で、速度を上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed with monstrous power from final corner onward when passing from outside

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤に3回追い抜くと最終直線で速度がすごく上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: During the last leg of the race make three overtakes to strongly increase your speed on the final straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで後ろから追い抜くと女帝たる走りで速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed when passing in the back in last corner

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤のコーナーで先頭にいるとこれ幸いと加速力を上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On last corner, gain acceleration when in the first position

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で追い抜くと勝利の方程式を導き、速度を上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed when passing in the front of the last corner

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で競り合うと直線で抜け出しやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: After a struggle for the lead on the last corner, it becomes easier to break away during the final straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線までみずから崩れることなく前の方にいると速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Lead by yourself without letting up until the final straight to increase your speed

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置につこうとして加速力が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase acceleration as you attempt to overtake in last corner

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で抜け出した時に強い意志を持って速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Break away on the last straight to steel your will and increase your speed

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半のコーナーで控えていると持久力が回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Recover stamina in the second half of the race's corner by holding yourself back

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で競り合いに負けない強い気持ちが湧き、速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Your speed increases on the last straight when competing for the lead

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中間付近で好位置にいる時に追い抜くと勢いづき進出を開始する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Gain momentum while in a good position when passing someone in the middle leg

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半に中団から仕掛け始める時に持てるパフォーマンスを発揮して加速力を少しずつ上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: In the race's second half, increase acceleration if you start overtaking from the middle of the pack

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半に前の方で競り合うとバクシン力（？）を発揮、速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: During the later half of the race, your speed increases when competing for the lead

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤で好位置にいる時に持久力が回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Be in good position in Middle Leg to recover endurance

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤の直線で先頭を奪われそうになると譲らない想いが力になる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Gain momentum in the Middle Leg's straight with the feeling of keeping the lead from being overtaken

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで集団の後方の位置から前へ出る時、切れ味が増し速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed in the last corner when coming up from the back of the pack

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くのウマ娘を見て持久力を回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: When in the back in last corner, restore your endurance when you see another horse girl

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤に前方が詰まるとお告げの力で道を切り開く
skill-desc.skill_translated: When the front is packed during the last leg of the race, the oracle's power will open a path

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうになると秘めた闘志に火が付き速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed increases

skill-desc.skill_description: レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り200mで実力発揮、速度がすごく上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: After proceeding through the race calmly, your speed drastically increases during the last 200m

skill-desc.skill_description: 中盤で2回スキルを使うとよりリラックスして持久力が回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Restore endurance if you activate two skills in the middle part of the race

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で前の方で追いすがっていると不屈の闘志で速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed in the last straight when chasing someone close to the lead

skill-desc.skill_description: スキルで持久力を回復するとレース後半で前のほうにいる時にレッツラゴー！と速度を上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: In the race's second half, increase speed when recovering endurance with skills while in front

skill-desc.skill_description: 中盤に後ろの方で順位を下げた時に優しい光で持久力を回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: During Middle Leg, recover stamina when overtaken in the back of the pack

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナー以降に前めで力が尽きかけ詰め寄られると速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed after the last corner when stamina runs out being one of the lead

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで中団から前を狙う時魂を燃え滾らせて加速力を上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On last corner, gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle pack

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤で前の方から仕掛け始める時に速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increase speed in Middle Leg when overtaking someone close to lead

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で抜くと速度が後ろの方で抜くと加速力が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On last corner, gain speed when passing in front or acceleration when passing in back

skill-desc.skill_description: 上り坂がわずかに上手くなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Become slightly better at uphills

skill-desc.skill_description: 近くにウマ娘がたくさんいると速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed when many girls are nearby

skill-desc.skill_description: レース序盤にスキルを多く発動すると加速力がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase acceleration when many skills are activated during the Opening Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤にスキルを多く発動すると速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed if many skills were activated during the Middle Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤にスキルを多く発動すると持久力がわずかに回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly recover stamina if many skills activate during the Final Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: シンパシーの心を持つウマ娘が多いレースだと少し能力が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Increases ability a little if there are many girls with Sympathetic Heart

skill-desc.skill_description: 自分だけが一匹狼の心を持つレースで少し能力が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Raises your abilities a little if you're the only girl with Lone Wolf's Heart

skill-desc.skill_description: 前のウマ娘のすぐ後ろに付けると風の抵抗をわずかに受けにくくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: When following right behind a girl, become slightly less affected by wind resistance

skill-desc.skill_description: すぐ後ろにウマ娘が長くいると速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed when a girl has been following you for a while

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤に競り合うと速度が上がる＜ダート＞
skill-desc.skill_translated: Dirt・Increase speed when competing for position during the Middle Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤に競り合うと速度がわずかに上がる＜ダート＞
skill-desc.skill_translated: Dirt・Slightly increase speed when competing for position during the Middle Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: レースへの渇望により能力が少し発揮しやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Use your craving to race to demonstrate your abilities a little better

skill-desc.skill_description: かつての走りとは違うがあの頃と変わらない想いが能力をすごく上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Remembering the slightly different yet unchanging running of the past, raise your ability greatly

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤に前の方で相手を抜くと速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed when overtaking in the front in Final Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で差を付けて先頭にいると速度をわずかに上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed if you have big lead in Final Leg straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で前と差が詰まると速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Lightly increase speed when closing down the leader on the final straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナー以降で前の方にいると加速力がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase acceleration from final corner onward when leading

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で前の方で少し抜け出ていると速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: If you're in front at the final straight and manage to break out a little, increase speed a little

skill-desc.skill_description: 残り200m地点で前の方にいると少し抜け出しやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: If you're in the front when there's 200m remaining, passing becomes a bit easier

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中間からロングスパートをかけて速度がちょっとずつ上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: From the middle of the race very slightly increase your speed by running a long spurt

skill-desc.skill_description: 残り200mを切って前の方にいると速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed when close to the lead in last 200m

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半で1番をキープし続ける力をちょっと発揮する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Display a bit of your ability to keep 1st place during the later half of the race

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで好位置にいると加速力がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Be in good position at last corner to slightly increase acceleration

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Your speed increases slightly when passing during the last straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で後ろの方から外を回って追い抜く時、速度をわずかに上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On last straight, gain slight speed when passing from the outside back

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方にいると速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed if you're at the front after the last corner

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で余力を持って前にいるとちょっと優位を保ちやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: If you're in front during the last straight with spare energy, it becomes easier to keep a good position

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で競り合うと速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Fight for the lead at the last corner to slightly increase your speed

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナー以降で外から追い抜くと速度をわずかに上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly Increase speed from final corner onward when passing from outside

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤に3回追い抜くと最終直線で速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Overtake 3 times in Final Leg to lightly increase speed in the final straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで後ろから追い抜くと速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Your speed increases slightly when passing from the back in the last corner

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤のコーナーで先頭にいると加速力をわずかに上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On last corner, slightly gain acceleration when in the first position

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で追い抜くと速度をわずかに上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Your speed increases slightly when passing on the front in the last corner

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で競り合うと直線でちょっと抜け出しやすくなる
skill-desc.skill_translated: When competing for the lead during the last corner, it becomes easier to break away on the straight

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線までみずから崩れることなく前の方にいるとわずかに速度が上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Lead without letting up until final straight to increase your speed slightly

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置につこうとして加速力がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Your acceleration increases slightly while keeping a good position during the Final Leg's corners

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で抜け出した時に速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Break away in final straight to steel your will and slightly increase speed

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半のコーナーで控えていると持久力がわずかに回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: When being held back on corners of the later half of the race, your endurance recovers slightly

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で競り合いに負けない気持ちが湧けば、速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: When competing for the lead during the last straight, your speed increases slightly

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中間付近で好位置にいる時に追い抜くとちょっと進出を開始する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Gain slight momentum while in a good position when passing someone in the Middle Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半に中団から仕掛け始める時に加速力をちょっとずつ上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: In the race's second half, increase acceleration very slightly if you start overtaking from the middle of the pack

skill-desc.skill_description: レース後半に前の方で競り合うと速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Your speed increases slightly on the later half of the race when in front competing for the lead

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤で好位置にいる時に持久力がわずかに回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Your endurance recovers slightly when in a good position during the Middle Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤の直線で先頭を奪われそうになると譲らない想いがちょっと力になる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Gain slight momentum in the Middle Leg's straight with the feeling of keeping the lead from being overtaken

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで集団の後方の位置から前へ出る時、速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed in the last corner when coming up from the back of the pack

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くのウマ娘を見て持久力をわずかに回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: If you're in the back during the last corner, your endurance recovers slightly

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤に前方が詰まるとお告げ次第で道をわずかに切り開く
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly easier to find an opening if blocked at the front in Final Leg

skill-desc.skill_description: レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうになると速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed slightly increases

skill-desc.skill_description: レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り200mで実力発揮、速度が少し上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: After proceeding through the race calmly, your speed increases a little during the last 200m

skill-desc.skill_description: 中盤で2回スキルを使うと持久力がわずかに回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: Restore endurance slightly if you activate two skills in the middle part of the race

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終直線で前の方で追いすがっていると速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed in the last straight when chasing someone close to the lead

skill-desc.skill_description: スキルで持久力を回復するとレース後半で前のほうにいる時にわずかに速度を上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: In the race's second half, increase speed slightly when recovering endurance with skills while in front

skill-desc.skill_description: 中盤に後ろの方で順位を下げた時に持久力をわずかに回復する
skill-desc.skill_translated: During Middle Leg, slightly recover stamina when overtaken in the back of the pack

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナー以降に前めで力が尽きかけ詰め寄られると速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed after the last corner when stamina runs out being one of the lead

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで中団から前を狙う時加速力をわずかに上げる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On last corner, slightly gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle pack

skill-desc.skill_description: レース中盤で前の方から仕掛け始める時に速度がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: Slightly increase speed in Middle Leg when overtaking someone close to lead

skill-desc.skill_description: 最終コーナーで前の方で抜くと速度が後ろの方で抜くと加速力がわずかに上がる
skill-desc.skill_translated: On last corner, slightly gain speed when passing in front or acceleration when passing in back
